vote.title: Authorize a work order under the existing Job Order Contract, previously approved on November 13, 2024, by Resolution No. 24-1627, for construction services with Phoenix I Restoration and Construction, LLC. at The Women’s Museum located at 3800 Parry Avenue, Dallas, Texas 75210 for work associated with the temporary relocation of The Black Academy of Arts and Letters to facilitate construction and renovation of Component 4 of the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Master Plan - Not to exceed $5,913,458.00 - Financing - Convention Center Construction Fund
vote.description: Authorize a work order under the existing Job Order Contract, previously approved on November 13, 2024, by Resolution No. 24-1627, for construction services with Phoenix I Restoration and Construction, LLC. at The Women’s Museum located at 3800 Parry Avenue, Dallas, Texas 75210 for work associated with the temporary relocation of The Black Academy of Arts and Letters to facilitate construction and renovation of Component 4 of the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Master Plan - Not to exceed $5,913,458.00 - Financing - Convention Center Construction Fund
